00059 void OSMWay::paint( QPainter* painter, double minlat, double minlon )
00060 {
00061   QPolygon polygon;
00062   foreach( OSMNode* i, nodes() )
00063   {
00064     //TODO: The *2000 (or whatever it is now) is for zoom purposes, it needs to be part of some sort of
00065     //zoom feature/variable
00066     polygon.append( QPoint( (i->lon() - minlon) * 40000, painter->device()->height() - (i->lat() - minlat) * 40000 ) );
00067   }
00068   
00069   qDebug() << "draw [" << polygon[0].x() << "," << polygon[0].y() << "]";

00073     painter->setPen( QPen( QBrush( Qt::black ), 2 ) );
